ch0359_00_volo2/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’m sure
you also wish for a better world.
ch0359_00_volo2/0101_0701_02_10:
Allow me to create this world anew
and make our wish come true!
ch0359_00_volo2/7101_0701_01_10:
I am a Pokémon wielder...one who is
able to make Pokémon follow orders.
ch0359_00_volo2/7101_0701_02_10:
I will not speak of such naive concepts
as “bonds.”
ch0359_00_volo2/7101_0701_03_10:
Even if I am dealing with a Pokémon
others call a deity, it WILL follow my
orders.
ch0359_00_volo2/7102_0701_01_10:
I simply act upon my natural curiosity
and ambition.
ch0359_00_volo2/7102_0701_02_10:
I MUST fulfill my heart’s desire to create
the world anew!
ch0359_00_volo2/7103_0701_01_10:
Giratina’s a Pokémon of the same caliber
as Dialga and Palkia.
ch0359_00_volo2/7103_0701_02_10:
It was banished for bearing its fangs
at Arceus.
ch0359_00_volo2/7103_0701_03_10:
That makes me wonder how strong its
desire to challenge Arceus is now.
ch0359_00_volo2/7104_0701_01_10:
Ever since I became convinced that
Arceus really does exist, my thoughts
have been consumed by how to meet it.
ch0359_00_volo2/7104_0701_02_10:
I bent all of my passion and interest to
studying Arceus!
ch0359_00_volo2/7104_0701_03_10:
If I could meet Arceus myself and
subjugate its power, what would
happen? What could I accomplish?
ch0359_00_volo2/7104_0701_04_10:
I simply MUST know! My curiosity cannot
be contained!
ch0359_00_volo2/7105_0701_01_10:
Answer me, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Do you have some dream that propels
you?
ch0359_00_volo2/7105_0701_02_10:
If you do, doubtless that dream of yours
would never leave room for the dreams
of one like me...
ch0359_00_volo2/7105_0701_03_10:
I wonder how many times I will show up
in the story of your life.
ch0359_00_volo2/1701_0701_01_10:
Allow me to give you something I think
you’d find interesting.
ch0359_00_volo2/1701_0702_01_10: Let your curiosity take over. Use it.
ch0359_00_volo2/2501_0701_01_10:
In the Hisui region, Arceus did not
choose me.
ch0359_00_volo2/2501_0701_02_10:
However, I’m sure I’ll receive its blessing
here on Pasio!
ch0359_00_volo2/2501_0701_03_10:
Actually, no... I’ll MAKE it
acknowledge me!
ch0359_00_volo2/2501_0702_01_10:
No matter how many years, how many
decades, how many centuries it takes
me, my feelings will never change!
ch0359_00_volo2/2511_0701_01_10:
Have you ever experienced an outsider
appearing out of nowhere and snatching
what you’ve chased for years?
ch0359_00_volo2/2511_0701_02_10:
I suppose even if you did, you wouldn’t
harbor any hate or envy toward them.
ch0359_00_volo2/2511_0702_01_10:
Although there are times I find myself
envying you, I’m glad I’ve stuck to my
convictions.
ch0359_00_volo2/2511_0702_02_10:
My persistence is what keeps me seeking
a path that leads to my deity!
ch0359_00_volo2/3001_0701_01_10:
I plan to closely observe what you
accomplish today.
ch0359_00_volo2/3003_0701_01_10:
Just as the sun lights the world, my
curiosity and ambition light the path to
my glorious dreams.
ch0359_00_volo2/3005_0701_01_10:
You can sleep in peace. Tomorrow will
surely bring a new and better world.
